mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FINAL_HOSTS ( HOST_NO, HOST_USER_NO, ACCOUNT_HOLDER_NAME, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, BANK_NAME, HOST_NAME, HOSTING_TYPE, HOST_TEL ) VALUES (FINAL_HOST_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{accountHolderName}, #{accountNumber}, #{bankName}, #{name}, #{hostingType}, #{tel} )

INSERT INTO TB_FINAL_HOSTS ( ACCOMMO_NO, HOST_NO, ACCOMMO_TYPE, ACCOMMO_NAME, ACCOMMO_INTRO_TITLE, ACCOMMO_INTRO_CONTENT, ACCOMMO_WEB_ADDRESS, ACCOMMO_CHECK_IN_TIME, ACCOMMO_CHECK_OUT_TIME, ACCOMMO_ADDRESS ) VALUES (FINAL_ACCOMMO_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{hostNo}, #{type}, #{name}, #{introTitle}, #{introContent}, #{webAddress}, #{checkInTime}, #{checkOutime}, #{adress} )

INSERT INTO TB_FINAL_HOSTS ( ACTIVITI_NO, HOST_NO, MAXIMUM_NUMBER, PRICE_PER_PERSON, ACTIVITY_NAME, ACTIVITY_ADDRESS, ACTIVITY_INTRO_TITLE, ACTIVITY_INTRO_CONTENT ) VALUES (FINAL_ACTIVITY_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{hostNo}, #{maximumNumber}, #{pricePerPerson}, #{name}, #{adress}, #{introTitle}, #{introContent} )
mapper.select: select host_no as no, host_user_no as userNo, host_name as name, account_holder_name as accountHolderName, account_number as accountNumber, bank_name as bankName, hosting_type as hostingType, host_tel as tel, grade_name as gradeName from tb_final_hosts where host_no = #{value}
